titleStmt.title: The Popes bull gelded or An edict published by the Duke and State of Venice, against the late bull of Pope Paulus Quintus the sixth of May 1606. in the fourth indiction. Truly translated out of the Italian coppy, as appeareth in this booke.
titleStmt.author: Venice (Republic : to 1797). Doge (1606-1612 : Donato)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Windet] for Iohn Hardie, dwelling on Saint Peters Hill,

notesStmt.note: The English translation is followed by the original Italian text, which has caption title: Leonardo Donato per gratia di Dio Duce di Venetia, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College.
